welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Koryo, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and delicious cuisine. We are excited to have you here and invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: The free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
